lead_paragraph: In canonizing Roger Federer, some ignore Rod Laver from 1963 to 1967, when he disappeared into that era’s all but invisible pro tour.
snippet: In canonizing Roger Federer, some ignore Rod Laver from 1963 to 1967, when he disappeared into that era’s all but invisible pro tour.
